name: GET READY (AAhmed9)
description:
Get Ready is a 2D game on Unity where you see animations on all my scenes; a scoring system implemented by using C# Scripts and other fundamentals; detect collisions, receive user input and create player movements; adding a sound effect; making a nice looking UI system to build the game. 

Get Ready is a beginner type of game where it is aimed at people who wants to learn more about Unity Programming as there is a high demand for Unity developers around the world.

Controls: A or Left Arrow (Move Left), D or Right Arrow (Move Right)
